Yeah, I have clang-tidy-6.0, and I see the following repeated pattern for every component.

``
40652 warnings and 1 error generated.
Error while processing /data/ignition/ign-gazebo-prs/test/plugins/TestModelSystem.cc.
warning: dynamic exception specification '' is deprecated; consider using 'noexcept' instead [modernize-use-noexcept]
/data/ignition/ign-gazebo-prs/include/ignition/gazebo/EntityComponentManager.hh:514:26: warning: invalid case style for parameter 'iterator' [readability-identifier-naming]
          detail::View>::iterator &_iter) const;
                         ^~~~~~~~
                         _iterator
```

`` 40652 warnings and 1 error generated.
